title: Jasprit Bumrah yorker hits Ishan Kishan, Sanju Samson on standby for Abhishek Sharma
desc: Cricket News: Ishan Kishan continued to look in ominous touch during India’s training session on Wednesday before a searing Jasprit Bumrah yorker cut his stint shor.

title: Fear and Gibson suffer nightmare on ice as GB Winter Olympic medal drought goes on
desc: Lewis Gibson and Lilah Fear fell short in their bid to emulate Torvill and Dean, finishing seventh in the ice dancing competition

title: Winter Olympics 2026: How to watch Team Canada live - full schedule and medal events on Thursday (12 February)
desc: Find out everything you need to know about Canada’s Olympians on Day 6 of Milano Cortina 2026.

title: Use banknotes that are fit for ang pow
desc: PETALING JAYA: Bank Negara has encouraged Malaysians to use fit banknotes during festive seasons as part of its ongoing Go Green campaign.

title: Cisco Earnings Top Estimates, But Shares Dip
desc: Cisco stock fell amid fiscal Q2 earnings and revenue that topped estimates while the company's revenue outlook came in above views.

title: Burnley seal stunning comeback victory against Crystal Palace after own goal
desc: Crystal Palace went 2-0 up but then Burnley went on the attack and scored three quick goals before the break to win 3-2, a Jefferson Lerma own goal giving them victory

title: Concerns for seafarers on retired Interislander ferry
desc: The former Aratere is anchored in Tasman Bay, pending consent to enter India.

title: Alzheimer’s plaques decline after CAR-T immune cell treatment in preclinical study
desc: Researchers engineered CD4+ chimeric antigen receptor T cells targeting fibrillar amyloid beta and tested them in a mouse Alzheimer model. The preclinical study showed reduced amyloid pathology and altered neuroimmune responses, supporting CAR-T immunotherapy as a potential future Alzheimer strategy.

title: Match Report & Highlights
desc: Report as Celtic beat Livingston 2-1 at home thanks to a dramatic late winner from Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain on debut for the club; Marcelo Saracchi opened the scoring for Celtic but Robbie Muirhead equalised from the spot; Oxlade-Chamberlain then scored in the 91st minute to win it

title: Man City player ratings vs Fulham: Over to you, Arsenal! Erling Haaland and Antoine Semenyo lead way in awesome attacking display while Nico O'Reilly and Phil Foden impress
desc: Rating the Manchester City players from their 3-0 win over Fulham in the Premier League
